# News comment title:
Green Day Chants ‘No Trump, No KKK’ at American Music Awards

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
If KKK was modernized, it would look exactly like these fatherless punk bastards.

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
So. Much. Stupid. with these people. There is NO proof Trump was ever involved in the KKK. However, there is video of Crooked Hillary calling black people "super predators" who needed "to be brought to heel". There is video proof of her calling segregationist Robert "KKK" Byrd her mentor. There is video proof of the KKK admitting to giving her 25k and endorsing her. Her husband rapist Bill's mentor was segregationist J. William Fulbright. Bill's VP was Al Gore Jr, the son of segregationist Al Gore Sr. Byrd, Fulbright and Gore Sr. were against the Civil Rights Act and Byrd tried to filibuster it. So shove it up your arse Billy Joe! 

Green Day hasn't been relevant since Bill Clinton's first term anyway. A bunch of ignorant middle aged men looking pathetic on stage.

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


Wow!  What a high class group.  Too bad they never learned that the Democrats created the KKK.

>>> END COMMENT <<<
